name: Billing & Payments
keywords: invoice, payment, charge, refund, subscription, billing, price, cost, fee, credit card, renewal
content: Billing & Payments category handles issues related to invoices, payments, refunds, subscription changes, pricing questions, and payment method updates. Includes disputes about charges, failed transactions, and billing cycle inquiries. Route to Finance Support with 24 hour SLA. High priority indicators: overcharged, fraudulent, urgent refund, account suspended. Medium priority: billing question, update payment, cancel subscription. Low priority: pricing info, invoice copy, payment history.

name: Technical Support
keywords: error, bug, crash, API, integration, broken, not working, slow, timeout, 500, 404, exception
content: Technical Support category handles product bugs, errors, system crashes, integration issues, API problems, performance degradation, and technical troubleshooting. Includes connectivity issues and software malfunctions. Route to Technical Support with 4 hour SLA. Critical priority indicators: system down, data loss, security breach, production outage. High priority: cannot login, API failure, integration broken. Medium priority: slow performance, intermittent issue, minor bug. Low priority: feature question, documentation, how to.

name: Sales & Pricing
keywords: pricing, enterprise, demo, quote, discount, contract, upgrade, plan, features, comparison, partnership
content: Sales & Pricing category handles pre-sales inquiries, pricing negotiations, enterprise deals, contract discussions, and upgrade requests. Includes demo requests and partnership opportunities. Route to Sales Team with 8 hour SLA. High priority indicators: enterprise deal, large contract, urgent demo, competitor evaluation. Medium priority: upgrade inquiry, pricing question, feature comparison. Low priority: general inquiry, newsletter, webinar.

name: Account Management
keywords: password, login, account, profile, settings, 2FA, security, access, locked, verify, ownership
content: Account Management category handles account access issues, password resets, profile updates, security concerns, two-factor authentication, and account settings. Includes account verification and ownership transfers. Route to Account Support with 2 hour SLA. High priority indicators: account hacked, locked out, security concern, urgent access. Medium priority: password reset, 2FA issue, profile update. Low priority: settings question, notification preferences.

name: General Inquiries
keywords: question, feedback, suggestion, information, help, general, other, compliment, complaint
content: General Inquiries category handles general questions, feedback, feature requests, company information, and non-categorizable inquiries. Includes compliments, complaints, and miscellaneous requests. Route to General Support with 48 hour SLA. High priority indicators: complaint, escalation request, legal concern. Medium priority: feature request, general feedback. Low priority: information request, compliment, general question.
